#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int fastio()
{
	int x=0;
	char c;
	c=getchar_unlocked();
	while(c<'0'||c>'9')
	{
		c=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
	{
		x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
		c=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	return x;
}
int main(void)
{
	int t,n;
	long long int ans;
	t=fastio();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=fastio();
		ans=(4*n*(4*n-1)*(4*n-2))/6;
		if(ans>=3)
		{
			ans-=(4*n*(n-1)*(n-2))/6;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
